thread.title: CSI Partners with Execupay to Enhance Payroll Solution Offerings to Customers
thread.title_full: CSI Partners with Execupay to Enhance Payroll Solution Offerings to Customers

author: admin
title: CSI Partners with Execupay to Enhance Payroll Solution Offerings to Customers
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 12:47 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Execupay 
SAN ANTONIO, Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- CSI , a leading provider of end-to-end financial technology solutions, has selected Execupay , the leading privately-owned provider of HR and payroll services and software, to bring innovative payroll and HR solutions to CSI customers. Through the partnership, CSI will provide its customers with access to Execupay's robust payroll services, enabling them to utilize more strategic payroll and HR tools. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150930/272409 
"At CSI, our goal is to give our customers world-class solutions that bring efficiencies to their businesses," said Steve Powless, CEO of CSI. "Our partnership with Execupay supports that effort by delivering industry-leading payroll and HR tools that meet the challenging compliance demands of our industry, while also providing opportunities to achieve new revenue." 
CSI customers can transfer their existing payroll services to Execupay, who currently supports tens of thousands of businesses nationwide. What sets the Execupay platform apart from other payroll services is that their products are tailored to each bank's size and specific business needs. Some of the features of their solution, in addition to payroll and HR services, is time and labor management, tax services, ACA management, business intelligence, onboarding, recruiting, and benefits administration, among other offerings. 
CSI and Execupay also understand that many financial institutions make every effort in today's environment to continually increase customer satisfaction and revenue streams; one growing trend is for financial institutions to offer their own payroll services. Therefore, through this partnership, CSI clients also gain access to Execupay's market-leading Financial Institution Channel Payroll Program, which allows them to offer white-labeled payroll and HR solutions to their business customers. 
"We have created an offering to specifically meet the needs of financial institutions and their customers, making it simple to bundle payroll with treasury management services," said Gerald Stowers, CEO of Execupay. 
To showcase this new partnership, Execupay will be sponsoring and exhibiting at CSI's upcoming Customer Conference 2015 in Nashville, Tennessee, from Sept. 30 through Oct. 2. 
About Execupay Headquartered in San Antonio, Texas, Execupay provides human capital management services and solutions covering payroll, time and labor management, talent acquisition, talent management, and HR management to thousands of companies of all sizes throughout the United States and Internationally. The company also licenses payroll service software and offers private label partnership opportunities. Driven by technology and innovation, Execupay is the largest privately owned provider of payroll and human capital management software for payroll service companies in the United States and provides payroll to over 1 million employees. For additional information, call us at (210) 366-9511 or visit www.execupay.com . 
About Computer Services, Inc. Computer Services, Inc. (CSI) delivers core processing, managed services, mobile and Internet solutions, payments processing, print and electronic distribution, and regulatory compliance solutions to financial institutions and corporate customers across the nation. Exceptional service, dynamic solutions and superior results are the foundation of CSI's reputation and have resulted in the company's inclusion in such top industry-wide rankings as the FinTech 100, Talkin' Cloud 100 and MSPmentor Top 501 Global Managed Service Providers List. CSI's stock is traded on OTCQX under the symbol CSVI. For more information about CSI, visit www.csiweb.com . CONTACT: Alexandra Hopkins Brandon Dyce For Execupay For CSI 210-366-9511 615-545-1675
